<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2560</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Rise and fall of the tides</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anstieg und Fall der Gezeiten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Élévation et chute des marées</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ascensão e queda das marés</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aumento e caduta delle maree</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανοδος και πτώση των παλιρροιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Subida y caída de las mareas</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which dmonstrates the rise and fall of the tides in accordance with the phases of the moon</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oceanogrpahy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lunar phases</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation die dmonstrates der Anstieg und 
der Fall der Gezeiten in Übereinstimmung mit den Phasen des 
Mondes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui dmonstrates l'élévation et la
chute des marées selon les phases de la lune</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que dmonstrates a ascensão e a 
queda das marés de acordo com as fases da lua</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che dmonstrates l'aumento e la 
caduta delle maree in conformità con le fasi della luna</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που dmonstrates η άνοδος και η πτώση 
των παλιρροιών σύμφωνα με τις φάσεις του φεγγαριού</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que dmonstrates la subida y la 
caída de las mareas de acuerdo con las fases de la luna</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">oceanogrpahy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mondphasen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">oceanogrpahy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">phases lunaires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">oceanogrpahy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fases lunares</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">oceanogrpahy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fasi lunari</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">oceanogrpahy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">oceanogrpahy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fases lunares</string>
